Text: O̩do̩ e̩ke̩gweji kʼEhaz jʼonu Juda, Hoshia o̩ma Ela chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Samaria, oñ i je̩ o̩do̩ me̩la.
I laño̩ chʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa, i muda che alu kʼamonu Israe̩l ku ma je̩ o̩gba-wñ che n.
Shalmane̩zer, onu Asiria, mʼogu ko wa bʼo̩; taku Hoshia mud adu-wñ, oñ i kʼe̩wñ ele wa ñw u.

Tak onu Asiria li ka ku Hoshia adʼalo nyʼowñ; todu i fʼamonuche kpe̩ ru So onu Ijipti, oñ i ma ma ño̩ ko e̩wñ ele wa ñw onu Asiria, alu ki tetache o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da ge̩ n; todule̩ onu Asiria fʼu dahi, oñ i mʼigbaligba ko nyʼu ago tʼef unyi uga.
Tak onu Asiria mute̩gu nyʼugbo du ane̩ le̩, i la te̩gu nyi Samaria, oñ i kpala nyʼu o̩do̩ me̩ta.
O̩do̩ Hoshia e̩ke̩la onu Asiria fu Samaria du, oñ i mʼabo Israe̩l ño̩ le tu Asiria, oñ i mʼuma ko jo̩ Hela, kpai o̩la omi Hebe̩r, owñ chʼaji Gozan le̩, kpai ewo ewo, abo Me̩dia.
Oñ i dʼabe̩le̩, todabu kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l du Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma re, owñ kʼi ko ma kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa, kwʼo̩wo̩ Fero onu Ijipti le̩, ku ma la kworailo amo̩jo̩ omune̩,
ku ma la ño̩ lule̩ teju e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ abo uche̩ichi ku Jihofa ko rikpolo bʼo̩gba amo̩ma Israe̩l te̩, kpai e-kʼamonu Israe̩l che le̩.
Oñ amo̩ma Israe̩l ño̩ che e̩wñ ki ma nyo̩ n nyu Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma maja maja. Ma la fʼotete otete ne ñw o̩la-ma ef ewo-ma chaka, akwo o̩do̩go̩ abo ide gbogbo wa ewo kʼi nʼaku;
ma la kʼojibo kpai Ashe̩rim gugu oj uwo du ki gbʼo̩gba, kpai of oli emimi chaka;
taku ma fʼotulale gujo oj otete o̩mo̩ le̩ du, alu kʼabo uche̩ichi ki Jihofa mʼuma ño̩ bʼo̩gba-ma te̩ che le̩; oñ ma kwoche e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ kʼama ki nyi Jihofa uwe̩do̩,
ma la chʼode e-kʼi Jihofa ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki che e̩wñ le̩ n.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Jihofa ka ñw abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda lʼalu amakache̩ okoke kpai lʼalu amagane̩ okoke du, kakini, Me̩ rida bʼo̩na e̩bie̩ne̩-me̩ te̩, kʼame̩ ki de uko̩ uko̩ kʼu te̩, kpai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi, teju alu du kʼuko̩-o̩la e-kʼu ñwa ñw amata-me̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe-kʼu du kpuche̩rʼume̩ lʼugbo amadu-mi amakache̩ le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ma ko̩ egbo̩; ma la fʼo̩lo̩-ma lo̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩lo̩ amata-ma, ku ma ma dʼo̩lo̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma rʼochochi n.

Oñ ma ko̩ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ kpai amata-ma kpai o̩la ibenu kʼi gba ma le̩; oñ ma kwotʼe̩wñ o̩wai ubi, tak ama onugo mud o̩wai, ma la lʼikpa abo uche̩ichi ku ma lʼuma dak a le̩, owñ chʼabo ku Jihofa ka ñwu ma ku ma we eche dab abo le̩.
Ma la hi uko̩ du ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma te̩ ñwu ma tinyo̩, oñ ma fʼojibo da ñw o̩la-ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma okuno̩ meji, ma la fʼAshe̩ra che, oñ ma dojikane̩ ñw o̩wo̩ e̩wñ ojale, ma la re̩ Beal.
Ma ño̩ je̩ ñw amo̩ma-ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpai onobule̩ ku ma le gu ef una le̩ du, ma la nʼifa abo̩, kpai e̩wñ ifamu ache, ma la ño̩ mʼo̩la-ma ko ta ñw e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa eche ku ma nyi u uwe̩do̩.
Todule̩ Jihofa we̩do̩ rʼabo Israe̩l tabale̩, oñ i mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩; i nʼe̩ne̩ du ki bo̩ n, chai o̩lo̩pu Juda kate.
Juda laño̩ de̩ uko̩ uko̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma te̩ ñwu ma ni ge̩, chai e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kʼabo Israe̩l che, e-le̩ ma lule̩ ef uwñ.
Taku Jihofa ko̩ amugbe̩ Israe̩l chaka, oñ i fʼuma chʼukata, i la mʼuma kojʼef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma jʼuma akpa, gbogbo tak i mʼuma ko rinyo̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩.
Todu i fʼabo Israe̩l kpanya bʼunyi Defid te̩; taku ma du Je̩ro̩boam, o̩ma Nebat, chʼonu, oñ Je̩ro̩boam le̩ fʼabo Israe̩l ne bʼetu Jihofa ubi te̩, i la je̩ ñwu ma fʼadure inaina ta.
Tak amo̩ma Israe̩l kwolule̩ ef adure Je̩ro̩boam du kʼi che; ma kwo bʼe-le̩ te̩ n;
gbogbo taku Jihofa mʼabo Israe̩l ño̩ bʼeju-wñ te̩ alu kʼi ka lʼalu amadu-wñ amakache̩ le̩ chaka. Abe̩le̩ ma mʼabo Israe̩l ko bʼoj ane̩-ma onugo te̩ nyʼAsiria gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.

Tak onu Asiria kʼamone̩ kwo Babilo̩n wa, kpai kwo Kuta, kpai kwo Afa, kpai kwo Hemat, kpai Se̩farfe wa, oñ i mʼuma ko jʼef ewo ewo Samaria koji amo̩ma Israe̩l; tak ama gbʼane̩ Samaria nyʼo̩wo̩, oñ ma kwododo ef ewo ewo-wñ.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku ma chane̩ edodo o̩mo̩, ma la railo Jihofa n; todule̩ Jihofa fʼamidu kpe̩ rʼef una, oñ amidu le̩ fʼabo iche̩kibo̩-ma kpa.

Todule̩ ma kʼo̩la ñw onu Asiria kakini, Abo uche̩ichi kʼuwe̩ ño̩ kʼe̩ ko ma jʼewo ewo abo Samaria le̩ ma oji ajo̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ du te̩ n; todule̩ i fʼamidu kpe̩ rʼef uma, e̩ la go, ma kpa ma, todabu ku ma ma ma e̩wñ elifo̩ o̩jo̩ ane̩ o̩mo̩ n.
Tak onu Asiria ñwa ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ mʼatamaʼka ku me̩ du kwʼo̩mo̩ du dabi wʼo̩mo̩; kʼama ki nyʼadodo o̩mo̩, tak owñ ki nako̩ ma oji ajo̩ kʼo̩jo̩ ane̩ le̩ du te̩.
Abe̩le̩ atamaʼka e-ku ma ño̩ kwo Samaria le̩ lewa dodo Be̩te̩l, oñ i ko̩ ma alu ku ma che ku ma railo Jihofa.
Abo uche̩ichi le̩ okoke du muda, fʼamo̩jo̩ e-ma che, oñ ma ko ma jʼef unyi unyi oj otete otete kʼabo Samaria che le̩, abo uche̩ichi okoke du ko̩ jʼef ewo e-ma ugbo ku ma dodo le̩.
Oñ abo Babilo̩n fu Suko̩t-beno̩t che, oñ abo Kut fu Ne̩rgal che, oñ abo Hemat fu Ashima che,
oñ abo Afa fu Nibhaz kpai Tartak che. Tak abo Se̩farfe fʼamo̩ma-ma gujo ef una ñw Adrame̩le̩k kpai Aname̩le̩k, amo̩jo̩ abo Se̩farfe le̩.
Abe̩le̩ ma chokpo Jihofa, oñ ma kwochi o̩la-ma chʼamatama otete otete le̩, tak ama le̩ che iche̩bo̩ todu ma ef unyi otete otete.
Ma chokpo Jihofa, ma la che o̩jo̩ e-ma onugo, alu kʼe̩wñ o̩gu abo uche̩ichi ugbo ku ma ño̩ ma kwo wa de̩.
Gbogbo tʼojolu eñini ma te̩tache alu ku ma che o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Ama chʼabo ki Jihofa kpalo kpai ama, kʼi la ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ ki railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n, me̩ ki la dojikane̩ ñwu ma n, me̩ ki che ma n, me̩ ki la che iche̩bo̩ ñwu ma n;
chai Jihofa, e-kʼi nʼukpahiu lile kpai o̩wo̩-wñ enadala te̩ ako me̩ kwoj ane̩ Ijipti wa, owñ le̩ me̩ railo, owñ le̩ me̩ adojikane̩ ñw u, owñ le̩ me̩ ki la che iche̩bo̩ ñw u;
oñ e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kpai uko̩-o̩la, kpai uko̩ kʼi te̩, e-kʼi ko̩ tane̩ todu me̩, e-le̩ me̩ adejutʼo̩ ku me̩ che ogbegbele̩; me̩ ki la railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n;
me̩ ki gbenyo̩ alo kʼu kpe̩ kpʼame̩ n; me̩ ki la railo amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n,
chai Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, me̩ arʼailo-wñ; tak owñ agba me̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ ame̩ne̩bi-me̩ chaka.
Ma muda gbo̩ n, oñ ma che alu ku ma te̩tache o̩gbo̩gba le̩.
Abe̩le̩ abo uche̩ichi le̩ nachokpo Jihofa, oñ ma nʼojibo-ma ku ma gbe̩ ache; amo̩ma-ma che abe̩le̩ ge̩ kpai amo̩ma amo̩ma-ma, alu kʼamata-ma che, alu le̩ ma che gbogbo tʼojolu eñini.
